name: F-1 Student Visa to USA from India
description: Standard timeline for Indian students applying for an F-1 visa after university acceptance.

steps.name: Receive I-20 Form
steps.description: The university sends the I-20 form, which is required for the visa application.

steps.name: Pay I-901 SEVIS Fee
steps.description: A mandatory fee for all F-1 students.

steps.name: Complete DS-160 Form
steps.description: The online nonimmigrant visa application form.

steps.name: Schedule Visa Interview & Biometrics
steps.description: Book appointments at the consulate. Wait times can vary significantly.
